channel.title: Help
channel.description: i added ban command to lostsoul 723 , but he does working. Any idea?

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Stupid_tree Stupid tree
item.description:
@Stupid_tree wrote:

[quote=“heatrn11, post:7, topic:449642”][quote author=Stupid tree link=topic=552533.msg4048480#msg4048480 date=1342281061]
}
if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“ipban”)&& (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(“Martis”))) {
String name = “”;
for (int i = 1; i < cmd.length; i++)
name += cmd[i] + ((i == cmd.length - 1) ? “” : " ");
Player target = World.getPlayerByDisplayName(name);
boolean loggedIn = true;
if (target == null) {
target = SerializableFilesManager.loadPlayer(Utils
.formatPlayerNameForProtocol(name));
if (target != null)
target.setUsername(Utils
.formatPlayerNameForProtocol(name));
loggedIn = false;
}
if (target != null) {
IPBanL.ban(target, loggedIn);
player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You’ve permanently ipbanned "+ (loggedIn ? target.getDisplayName() : name) + “.”);
} else {
player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("Couldn’t find player " + name + “.”);
}
return true;
}
try {
for (int i = Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]); i < Integer
.valueOf(cmd[2]); i++)
player.getPackets().sendGlobalConfig(i,
Utils.getRandom(Integer.valueOf(cmd[3])) + 1);
} catch (NumberFormatException e) {
player.getPackets().sendPanelBoxMessage(
“Use: config id value”);
}
return true;
}
[/quote]
Do you get any errors? What base is this?[/quote]
0 errors , lostsoul 667/723 . please some fix command.java and post here. Very please

Read full topic

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“ipban”)&& (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(“Martis”))) {
String name = “”;
for (int i = 1; i < cmd.length; i++)
name += cmd[i] + ((i == cmd.length - 1) ? “” : " ");
Player target = World.getPlayerByDisplayName(name);
boolean loggedIn = true;
if (target == null) {
target = SerializableFilesManager.loadPlayer(Utils
.formatPlayerNameForProtocol(name));
if (target != null)
target.setUsername(Utils
.formatPlayerNameForProtocol(name));
loggedIn = false;
}
if (target != null) {
IPBanL.ban(target, loggedIn);
player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You’ve permanently ipbanned "+ (loggedIn ? target.getDisplayName() : name) + “.”);
} else {
player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("Couldn’t find player " + name + “.”);
}
return true;
}
try {
for (int i = Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]); i < Integer
.valueOf(cmd[2]); i++)
player.getPackets().sendGlobalConfig(i,
Utils.getRandom(Integer.valueOf(cmd[3])) + 1);
} catch (NumberFormatException e) {
player.getPackets().sendPanelBoxMessage(
“Use: config id value”);
}
return true;
}[/quote]
Do you get any errors? What base is this?

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Stupid_tree Stupid tree
item.description:
@Stupid_tree wrote:

		}
		if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("ipban")&& (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Martis"))) {
			String name = "";
			for (int i = 1; i < cmd.length; i++)
				name += cmd[i] + ((i == cmd.length - 1) ? "" : " ");
			Player target = World.getPlayerByDisplayName(name);
			boolean loggedIn = true;
			if (target == null) {
				target = SerializableFilesManager.loadPlayer(Utils
						.formatPlayerNameForProtocol(name));
				if (target != null)
					target.setUsername(Utils
							.formatPlayerNameForProtocol(name));
				loggedIn = false;
			}
			if (target != null) {
				IPBanL.ban(target, loggedIn);
				player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You've permanently ipbanned "+ (loggedIn ? target.getDisplayName() : name) + ".");
			} else {
				player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("Couldn't find player " + name + ".");
			}
			return true;
		}
			try {
				for (int i = Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]); i < Integer
						.valueOf(cmd[2]); i++)
					player.getPackets().sendGlobalConfig(i,
							Utils.getRandom(Integer.valueOf(cmd[3])) + 1);
			} catch (NumberFormatException e) {
				player.getPackets().sendPanelBoxMessage(
						"Use: config id value");
			}
			return true;
		}

Read full topic
